Package clientSide.stubs

Class ControlCollectionSiteStub

java.lang.Object
clientSide.stubs.ControlCollectionSiteStub
public class ControlCollectionSiteStub extends Object
Stub to the Control and Collection Site. It instantiates a remote reference to the control and collection site. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

      public ControlCollectionSiteStub(String serverHostName, int serverPortNumb)

  • Method Details

    • takeARest

      public void takeARest()
      Transition take A Rest in the life cycle of the Master Thief. (DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO -> WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL) Master thief is waken up by the operation handACanvas of one of the assault party members returning from the museum.

    • handACanvas

      public void handACanvas(int roomID, int currentThiefIndex)
      Transition hand a canvas in the life cycle of the ordinary Thief. (COLLECTION_SITE -> COLLECTION_SITE) The thief hands the master the paintings he stole. The ordinary thief is waken up by the operation of the master thief: collectACanvas.
      Parameters:
      roomID - room id
      currentThiefIndex - current thief index

    • collectACanvas

      public Boolean[] collectACanvas()
      Transition collect a canvas in the life cycle of the Master Thief. (WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL -> DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO) The Master Thief collects the canvas from the ordinary thief. The Master notify the ordinary thief that has the canvas.
      Returns:
      assaul parties reset

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Operation server shutdown. New operation.
